uploadArticle.title: File-Upload
uploadArticle.content: Select the file with the button below. Then click the green button to view the family tree.
uploadArticle.detailSummary: From where do I get the data?
uploadArticle.detail: The file must be a valid GedcomX file in json format, as described {0}.

navigationArticle.title: Usage
navigationArticle.content: You can move the family tree with your mouse.While pressing {0}, you can zoom in and out with your mouse wheel. Select a person with your left mouse button to show their information. Many people have a circle with "+" or "-" inside them, clicking on those displays their relatives.

privacyArticle.title: Privacy Policy
privacyArticle.content: All family tree data is processed locally only and stored in the browser's local storage. The service is hosted on GitHub Pages, the corresponding privacy policy can be found {0}.
